casebody.data:
WALLEN
v.
SPORTS CENTER. No. 595P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Jerome P. Trehy, Jr., Raleigh, for Timothy Earl Wallen.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of November 2005 by Defendants to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2005."
